name: The Path (itch) (Taima)
description:
The Path

The Path is an interactive Point-And-Click picture story/”game” I made together with my friend Kyle  for our Bachelor Degree in Digital Game Design, trying to figure out how to use Environmental Storytelling to tell about a character.

In this game you follow a young girl on her journey through a beautiful, dreamlike landscape, though as you soon will notice, there is a darker shade just under the surface.
